title: Covid, Flu and RSV Are Increasing Hospitalizations in NYC
description: New Yorkers are falling ill with new variants of Covid and old illnesses like flu and RSV that masking and other precautions once held at bay.
dc:creator: Sharon Otterman
media:credit: Andrew Seng for The New York Times
media:description: New Yorkers waited for Covid bivalent booster shots at Bellevue Hospital this fall.
